mapinfo.detailsText:
Settled along the three parallel rivers, players will have to proceed upstream to explore this scenic region. 
 Natural obstacles could prove friends or foes, either shielding or trapping your units. 
 No trade routes run through this region but you can easily find Zen monasteries along the way. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Zen 
 -Outlaws: Wokou Horseman / Wokou Monk 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
